method.name: feed_is_active
method.description: Returns true if the feed with this id is active.

method.name: feed_set_active
method.description: Activates or deactivates the feed with the given id.

method.name: feeds
method.description: Returns an array of available feeds.

signal.name: camera_feed_added
signal.description: Signal to alert a new feed is available

signal.name: camera_feed_removed
signal.description: Signal to alert a feed was removed (say USB camera was unplugged or another program took ownership of a camera)
